message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $12,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price.
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I'm interested in the product, but $12,000 is a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $9,000 for it. Can you consider my offer?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While I value your offer, I'm looking for something closer to $11,000.  This product offers unique advantages and I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.
Hi Alice, I understand your concerns, but $11,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $10,200 for the product. Can you consider my revised offer?
